functions.tag: {title:"Eternal",author:"The Lich",pages:['{"text":"They called me a madman when I claimed to have uncovered the secret to eternal life. I was driven from my beloved city and banished from the kingdom for the practice of \\"witchcraft\\"."}','{"text":"After days of wandering through the wilderness, starved and cold, I came across an abandoned tower from the second age. I made it my home and began my work, collecting what I needed to craft my phylactery."}','{"text":"After long last, I had done it! I had achieved what so many could only dream of. Now I am free to master the arts of the arcane...to become the most powerful sorcerer in the land, and to take revenge on those who have shunned me!"}']}
